dataElement.name: workflowId
dataElement.label: Internal Id
dataElement.businessDescription: Internally generated. Unique across all workflows

dataElement.name: workflowName
dataElement.label: Workflow
dataElement.businessDescription: Name of the workflow definition, of which this is an instance

dataElement.name: documentId
dataElement.label: Document Id
dataElement.businessDescription: Id of the document that is being oushed thru this workflow

dataElement.name: initiatorId
dataElement.label: Initiator User Id
dataElement.businessDescription: user id, internal one, of the user who initiated this workflow

dataElement.name: initiatorAssignedRoleId
dataElement.label: Initiator Role
dataElement.businessDescription: User-role assigmenet id under which the user initiated this workflow

dataElement.name: knownActors
dataElement.label: Assigned Roles
dataElement.businessDescription: This is an internal field that has all roles for which users are already assigned for this workflow. It is a comma separated list of assignments in the form roleName1=assignedRoleId1,roleName2=assignedRoleId2....

dataElement.name: userRoleId
dataElement.label: User Role
dataElement.businessDescription: User role that took this step

dataElement.name: workflowAction
dataElement.label: Action
dataElement.businessDescription: Action that resulted in this step

dataElement.name: loginId
dataElement.label: Login Id
dataElement.businessDescription: This is teh Id that the user uses to get into the system

dataElement.name: userNickName
dataElement.label: User
dataElement.businessDescription: Name as it shoudl be displayed

dataElement.name: roleName
dataElement.label: Role
dataElement.businessDescription: unique name of this role. Not visible to users. Users will see label.

dataElement.name: roleLabel
dataElement.label: Role Label
dataElement.businessDescription: Role as seen by end users

dataElement.name: reportingRoleId
dataElement.label: Reporting Role
dataElement.businessDescription: Role to which this role reports to. 0 if this is the top role.

dataElement.name: reportingAssignedRoleId
dataElement.label: Reporting Role
dataElement.businessDescription: points to a key in the same tabale, except for role that do not report into any one else
